Replying to @connordav_is 2018-05-11 08:40
@dav_is_dev @ChrisFerdinandi @vincpa @ianfeather True. Do those things. They help. The difference is that *if* your site depends on JavaScript to be functional, or to convey and render the content, then *if* that fails to load/parse, the user is left at sea. Progressively enhancing from content in HTML can defend against this.
